title: What Biden’s Sanctions Actually Mean | Guests: Sen. Ted Cruz & Carol Roth | 3/2/22
description:
Glenn and Stu kick off the show by discussing President Biden’s State of the Union and Vice President Kamala Harris’ dumbed-down explanation of Ukraine. President Biden backtracked on the defund the police movement. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the 17 lies in Biden’s State of the Union. Sen. Ted Cruz joins to discuss Biden’s State of the Union and the current state of Ukraine and Russia. Senior editor for the Federalist Christopher Bedford joins Glenn to discuss his article “The Ruling Class Is a Far Greater Threat to Americans Than Russia Is.” Glenn dives into the Russia/Ukraine issue, Biden’s actions, private businesses, and how it all connects to the Great Reset. Author and former investment banker Carol Roth joins to discuss SWIFT, inflation, and the printing of money.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
